title: James Patterson - The Christmas Wedding (epub,mobi) KK
description:
James Patterson - The Christmas Wedding (epub,mobi)

The tree is decorated, the cookies are baked, and the packages are wrapped, but the biggest celebration this Christmas is Gaby Summerhill's wedding. Since her husband died three years ago, Gaby's four children have drifted apart, each consumed by the turbulence of their own lives. But the wedding isn't Gaby's only surpriseÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½she has one more gift for her children, and it could change all their lives forever. With deeply affecting characters and the emotional twists of a James Patterson thriller, The Christmas Wedding is a fresh look at family and the magic of the season.
